BIO

Hi, my name is Mani. I am a graphic designer and artist that has always had love for art since childhood. I have taken some fundamental courses in college but I am mostly self taught. My passion and appreciation for all forms of art and design has allowed me the ability to develop custom designs for a broad range of industries and clients. Thank you for taking some time to look through my portfolio.


I am open to discuss any full-time, part-time, freelance or commission opportunities. Please feel free to contact me with any inquiries.


Listed below are my most recent notable jobs.

Preferred Bonding & Insurance Services

2015 - Current

Graphic/Web Designer

Part-time freelance. Redesign logo and marketing material. Redesign website with direction from owner.

Zerosix Media

2012 - 11/2018

Senior Graphic Designer

Lead graphic designer in majority of projects. Brand development and graphic design for a wide range of industries.

Rafana Inc.

05/2018 - 12/2018

Graphic Designer

Offsite freelance project. Development of “Perfect Puffs” chip brand with concept and direction from brand owner. Design brand mascot. Design packaging and store display based on existing designs provided by owner. Redesign two versions (US and Turkey) of Wordpress websites under direction of owner.
